message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find incredibly valuable. I'm asking for $15,000.  Let me know your thoughts.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I believe it's a bit steep at $15,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $12,000. I'd be willing to meet you at $9,500. That's as high as I'm willing to go.
